title: WebP is so great except it's not (2021)
dot: digraph WebP_Evaluation{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor=lightblue];edge[fontname="Arial"];subgraph cluster_motivation{label="Motivation: Smooth User Experience";style=filled;color=lightgrey;"WordPress WebP Support"->"Smaller File Size (WebP)"[label="Enables"];"Smaller File Size (WebP)"->"Faster Loading"[label="Leads to"];"Faster Loading"->"Smooth User Experience"[label="Improves"];}subgraph cluster_problem{label="Problem: Quality Degradation";style=filled;color=lightgrey;"Low Quality WebP Conversion (e.g., lossy 80)"->"Posterization/Artifacts"[label="Causes"];"Posterization/Artifacts"->"Reduced Image Quality"[label="Leads to"];"Smooth Gradients (Photography)"->"Posterization/Artifacts"[label="Vulnerable to"];}"WordPress Plugins (SaaS)"->"Low Quality WebP Conversion (e.g., lossy 80)"[label="Promote/Perform"];"Misleading Metrics (SSIM, Averages)"->"Low Quality WebP Conversion (e.g., lossy 80)"[label="Justify"];"Lack of Artist Consultation"->"Misleading Metrics (SSIM, Averages)"[label="Contributes to"];subgraph cluster_solution{label="Solutions";style=filled;color=lightgrey;"Higher WebP Quality (90+)"->"Improved Visual Quality"[label="Leads to"];"Dithering/Noise"->"Reduced Posterization"[label="Mitigates"];"Avoid Re-encoding JPEG to WebP"->"Prevent Quality Loss"[label="Helps"];"Optimized Delivery (CDN, Responsive Images, Lazy Loading)"->"Faster Loading without Quality Loss"[label="Enables"];"Server-Side Conversion (ImageMagick/GraphicsMagick)"->"More Control over Quality"[label="Allows"];"Artist/Tech Collaboration"->"Better Understanding of Needs"[label="Promotes"];"Robust Metrics"->"Accurate Quality Assessment"[label="Enables"];}}
